result.advice: Based on the information provided, your Banana Plant is in the Seedling Stage. Here s some care advice: Environmental Requirements: Temperature: Try to maintain temperatures between 26-30 C. Moisture: Ensure 80-90 humidity. Soil: Make sure the plant is in well-draining, fertile soil with a pH level of 6.0-6.8. Water: Water the plant with 20-30mm per week (80-120mm monthly). Sunlight: Provide 8-10 hours of direct sunlight. Nutrient needs: Your plant needs high potassium and nitrogen. Additional tips: Protect the plant from strong winds.
